des.main: Defined and executed the product roadmap with market research, competitor analysis, and customer feedback loops.
Implemented analytics and A/B testing to drive data-backed decisions that improved engagement and product-market fit.
Architected automation and DevOps workflows that reduced operational overhead by ~25% and standardized documentation for scale.
Architected cloud-native platform serving 100+ vendors, aligning technology roadmap and infrastructure with revenue goals.
Built and mentored a 3-4 developer team with code review standards and agile workflows, cutting deployment time by 50% and improving reliability to 99.5% uptime.
Designed Docker-based CI/CD and automated deployments that reduced operational costs by 25% and enabled horizontal scalability.
Led vendor selection and payment integration strategy, improving platform performance by 30%.
Led a 4-person team to build an AI SaaS for image search and popularity prediction using CLIP and Flask APIs.
Developed a full-stack web app with Frappe, Vue.js/Jinja front end, Redis and MariaDB backend, and Dockerized Oracle VPS deployment.
Integrated Google and Facebook for authentication and social sharing, and built an Instagram scraper to feed training data.
Led technical team delivering a Dockerized Django application with CI/CD managed through Jenkins.
Coordinated API integration, database management, and deployment to achieve 40% build efficiency and 3x traffic scalability.
Managed project timeline and resource allocation across development and deployment phases.
Collected 82,867 Facebook interests using Python and Facebook API with robust error handling.
Automated workflows and stored datasets in MongoDB Atlas for analysis.
Flask web app that converts uploaded video/audio to text and generates summaries via Whisper v3 and BART models.
Preprocessed media with moviepy to extract audio before transcription and summarization.
React landing page with Express backend, deployed on Google Cloud Run with Google Analytics instrumentation.
Implemented routing, env-based configuration, and tracking for user behavior analysis.
First iteration of personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind, showcasing early projects and skills.
Built and customized a WordPress e-commerce site with Elementor for product showcases and ordering.
Configured shipping/payment flows, caching, and on-page SEO to improve conversion readiness.
Created a 3DoF VR experience with real-time camera background to explore the solar system using A-Frame and JS.
Included interactive navigation and scalable 3D models for planets and moons.
Automation platform to categorize chats, send broadcasts, and enable team collaboration for WhatsApp communication.
Added scheduling, templated replies, and basic analytics dashboards for response times and broadcast reach.
ERPNext customization covering accounting, sales, inventory, CRM, manufacturing, and projects with real-time dashboards.
Implemented automation, permissions, and reporting to improve process efficiency and scalability.
Real-time chat application using Socket.io and React with setup scripts for local development.
Supports multi-room messaging and server/client runbooks for quick start on ports 3000/8002.
Edited released Laravel app with Voyager admin, updating controllers, models, permissions, and handling MySQL.
Improved admin UX, tightened role-based access, and resolved production data consistency issues.
Designed and programmed a micromouse robot, reducing size to 80x92 mm and migrating body to PCB for stability.
Built maze-solving logic with sensor fusion, motor control tuning, and PCB-level optimizations for weight and speed.
Landing page for video production company built with Elementor and custom HTML/JS to hit 98% performance.
Upgraded SEO to reach 90% PageSpeed Insights and tuned animations for better engagement.

name: Faxes Management System - Full Stack Developer

des.main: Application to ingest, share, and authorize fax delivery across local network.
Front-end with HTML/CSS/JS/Jinja and backend using SQLAlchemy + Flask; added audit trails and role permissions.

name: WP plugin that connect woocommerce with Daftra - Freelance

des.main: Built WordPress plugin to sync WooCommerce with Daftra via REST APIs, handling auth and data mapping.
Implemented order sync, customer records, error logging, and retries for reliability.
